doc.title: Student Life
doc.snippet: In the afternoon on February 18th, the final of North China section - CFA Institute Research Challenge was held at Central University of Finance and Economicsâ€™ Academic Hall. Nine teams from several famous Chinese universities, including Peking University, Tsinghua University, Renmin University of China, Nankai University, Central University of Finance and Economics and so on, participated in the challenge. After several rounds of fierce competition, the team of Nankai University won the title Most Potential Team in the final of the North China section.
